docs.lead_paragraph: Data being released for the first time shows that hospitals charge Medicare vastly differing amounts for the same procedures, often far above what the program typically reimburses.

headline.seo: Hospital Billing Varies Wildly, U.S. Data Shows
headline.main: Hospital Billing Varies Wildly, Government Data Shows
headline.print_headline: Hospital Billing Varies Wildly, U.S. Data Shows

docs.abstract: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services release data that shows hospitals charge Medicare wildly differing amounts for the same procedure, raising questions about how hospitals determine prices; data covers bills submitted from virtually every hospital in the United States in 2011 for the 100 most common treatments and procedures performed in hospitals.
docs.snippet: Data being released for the first time shows that hospitals charge Medicare vastly differing amounts for the same procedures, often far above what the program typically reimburses.

keywords.value: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
keywords.name: organizations

byline.original: By BARRY MEIER, JO CRAVEN McGINTY and JULIE CRESWELL

docs.lead_paragraph: An interactive map shows how hospitals across the country charge Medicare different amounts for the same procedure.
docs.snippet: An interactive map shows how hospitals across the country charge Medicare different amounts for the same procedure.
